COMMON.REPORT_MESSAGE: We have reported this to our team ! Please close the app and start again!

CONFIGURE_URL.DESCRIPTION: If you are using a self-hosted Chatwoot installation, input your server URL. Otherwise, use app.chatwoot.com.

LOGIN.TITLE: Login to your account
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: You are connected to {{baseUrl}}. Login with your email address and password.

FORGOT_PASSWORD.TITLE: Forgot Password?
FORGOT_PASSWORD.SUB_TITLE: Don't worry! We got your back

CONVERSATION.EMPTY: Không có bất kì hoạt động trò chuyện nào trong nhóm.
CONVERSATION.PRIVATE_MSG_INPUT: This will be visible only to Agents

NOTIFICATION.EMPTY_MORE_TEXT: Once you start receiving notifications, they'll appear here.

NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.TITLE: Notification Preferences
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_CREATE_PUSH: Gửi thông báo khi cuộc trò chuyện mới được tạo
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNEE_PUSH: Gửi thông báo khi cuộc trò chuyện được chỉ định cho tôi
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED_NEW_MESSAGE_PUSH: Send push notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_CREATE_EMAIL: Gửi thông báo qua email khi cuộc trò chuyện mới được tạo
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNEE_EMAIL: Gửi thông báo qua email khi cuộc trò chuyện được chỉ định cho tôi
NOTIFICATION_PREFERENCE.CONVERSATION_ASSIGNED_NEW_MESSAGE_EMAIL: Send email notifications when a new message is created in an assigned conversation

ERRORS.COMMON_ERROR: Không thể kết nối với Máy chủ Woot, Vui lòng thử lại sau
ERRORS.OfFLINE: You must connect to Wi-fi or a cellular network to get online again
ERRORS.CANNOT_FETCH: There was an error fetching the information, please try again
ERRORS.AUTH: Tài khoản/Mật khẩu không đúng. Vui lòng thử lại
ERRORS.NO_ACCOUNTS_MESSAGE: You don't have access to any chatwoot accounts

SERVER_UPGRADE.TITLE: Server upgrade required
SERVER_UPGRADE.WARNING_FOR_AGENT: It seems like you are using unsupported Chatwoot server for your mobile app. Please contact your admin to upgrade your Chatwoot server.
SERVER_UPGRADE.WARNING_FOR_ADMIN: It seems like you are using unsupported Chatwoot server for your mobile app. Upgrading to server version %{minimumVersion} or later is required.

EXIT.TITLE: Exit
EXIT.SUBTITLE: Are you sure you want to quit?
